website_summaries.verdict: At a price that's hard to beat this lotion leaves skin moisturized and noticeably darker.
pros: Has a good smell and leaves skin soft

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bottle. I was hoping prior reviews were maybe a random mistake but nope my lotion is expired. Date of 30/062018 so almost one year expired. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: April Fronabarger

customer_reviews.title: Works well but this item is considered "BANNED" by most salons.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but don't let people at front desk see you are using this. They consider it a "banned" lotion to use indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on with nice results
customer_reviews.text: Goes on quickly and absorbs super fast. Generates an even caramel color enhanced by time in the tanning booth and, probably, just out in the sun. Nice fruity/sweet smell very inoffensive.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Budd

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this after doing research online however, once I used it I was a little confused as to why people who reviewed this said wash your hands after applying as I've never had an issue. It was also taking much longer than I anticipated to gain some color so I read further down the reviews and saw someone mentioned theirs was expired. I checked my bottle and low and behold it expired last June. I've been using it for a month.... Shouldn't have to worry about an expiration date when purchasing a brand new product online. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Walton

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: First time user and seems to be working well. I have noticed that I seem to be getting a quicker tan, using it with tanning bed, than in past times. The lotion goes on well and has a great smell. There is no greasy feeling afterwards and doesn't seem to stain clothes. I will continue to use the first bottle up and see how the end results are.
customer_reviews.author: TiaAnder

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I didn't love was the smell
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't tan very well and have very red undertones in my skin. This tanning bronzer really helped me achieve a more brown/bronze tan before my wedding. The only thing I didn't love was the smell. It smells like fruity gum or starbursts or something which I personally don't love which is why I took away one star. It would smell better as a vanilla or coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I read multiple reviews on the best out door accelerators before making this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Allowed me to achieve what usually takes 2-3 hours in 30 mins, I read multiple reviews on the best out door accelerators before making this purchase. It is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion because I researched best lotions for tanning fair skin.... because I am very fair and burn very easily. This stuff works great, smells great, and is very moisturizing. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A

customer_reviews.title: Gret results
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very moisturizing as well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on 08/01/2019 and the date on the bottle is “30/62018”. This is very expired. I confirmed on Australian Gold’s website that the date on the bottom of their bottles are an expiration date, not a sell by or use by date. Also the bottle came unsealed.
customer_reviews.author: Femke

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my mom
customer_reviews.text: My mom has a indoor tanning bed and refuses to spend them outrageous prices at the tanning salon. She loves this product a lot.
customer_reviews.author: lucke3er

customer_reviews.title: Great Bronzing Lotion!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bronzer the first time and layed out in the afternoon sun for just under 2 hours. There was a noticeable tan that looked nice and deep, not orange at all. If you burn easily I would recommend applying a base layer of spf prior to application of this product so that you will still tan but not burn.
customer_reviews.author: Nerma

customer_reviews.title: Good bronzer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tan accelerator. I would like this product better if they changed the smell, and the bronzer in it turned my palms and around my toenails an odd brown, but it was temporary. The bronzer does blend well on most of the body. If you are looking for a bronzer, I would recommend this, just wash your hands after applying it!
customer_reviews.author: DWilson

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED!
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews about the item being expired, but I assumed it was a fluke. I purchased this in July 2019, and it expired over a year ago! Also, it is not sealed in any way, so I wouldn't trust this product even if it wasn't past expiration date. DO NOT BUY THIS, IT WILL BE TAMPERED WITH AND EXPIRED! I am returning now for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly W

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working fairly well. The jury is ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working fairly well. The jury is still out. I just got a membership at Planet Fitness for $20 which includes unlimited tanning. I am 36 and have never had a tan. You can tell by my last name that I am Irish and we as a people have not traditionally tanned very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Loughlin

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using cheeky brown tanning lotion for years now and love it! I always get super tan using it, just be sure to wipe your hands after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Item had no seal and had leaked during shipping. It was also expired. Super disappointed. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: jaymz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been really happy with all of the Australian Gold lotions I have ordered this year. Super moisturizing, smells amazing, and adds a perfect amount of non orange color. I am pretty fair and even when I have no base than this looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn P

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works :) I did find I had more of a slightly orangey glow than with a regular tan and no bronzer. But, it is still totally natural looking. I have sensitive skin and I recommend not using on freshly shaved legs.
customer_reviews.author: kluddington

customer_reviews.title: Good tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: It is good tanning lotion, definitely see a little bit of difference right after tanning (but then washes off when you shower). As for tanning lotions it's the top end I've used. I'm giving it a 4 star since the bottle felt really cheap, the plastic wrapping was loose and didn't feel 'right'.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY tanning lotion I use. I have very fair skin and I'm 30 and started using a tanning bed and suffered burns and had to do several different times. When I started using this my tan well base tan was there within a week!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Miller

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: Date on the bottom was 30/062018 looked ok but is expired
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete perfection
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for indoor tanning! I got so dark with this. Absolutely no streaking what so ever. Had an absolutely beautiful tan for my wedding. Will be using again and highly recommend. Deep, dark tan!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Rodkey

customer_reviews.title: Smellin Good!
customer_reviews.text: I tan all year round and my tanning lotion is just too high. I tried this, because of the price, and WOW its better than some of the expensive ones.. Love the scent.. you dont smell like burnt skin.. I will def keep buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi B

customer_reviews.title: ... a tan before my engagement photos and I was pretty noticeably tan after about 3 times of laying out
customer_reviews.text: I used this to get a tan before my engagement photos and I was pretty noticeably tan after about 3 times of laying out. It gave me a nice even tan and it didn't look fake at all. It is a lot less greasy than the other product i was using and it smells really good. I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: A+, perfect price point!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Smell is amazing (it seems that most Australian Gold Products I have used have a similar pineapple/coconut smell). It led to an AWESOME indoor tan faster than any product I have ever used and did not make me feel greasy. You can NOT beat the price, either. As an added bonus, after tanning, my skin was super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this if you want to get a tan in a month !!
customer_reviews.text: I was using this in a tanning bed and didn’t get hardly any tan , used the whole bottle in 3wks. So i bought something else that worked great in a store for half the price. I got a great tan in 2 weeks of using the other kind..
customer_reviews.author: Jane Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Smelled amazing! I used it for about a month in a tanning bed, gradually increasing in bulb strength. It definatley made me look tanner faster! I just couldn’t keep the tan
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Lotion!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion Australian Gold is the best lotion you can buy. It always does what it says it will do. I used this 3 times in my tanning bed and already have great color. It smells like bubblegum, and blends in well. The bronzer is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Crap!
customer_reviews.text: This product is expired! I’m very upset that I spent my money on an expired product!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lotion the smell texture and everything about it I've only used it once so hoping it will work fine in my tanning bed. The delivery was very fast thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Judi S

customer_reviews.title: my favorite lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite lotion. It smells great and doesn't leave you feeling greasy. I bought this because i just started tanning again and i wanted an accelerator. I totally recommend this product to anyone starting out tanning. The results aren't instant but after a week of using it i'm starting to see results. I'll definitely be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: It is a good tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer of this lotion, bought from what the others said how well it is. It is a good tanning lotion, it doesn't rub off on to my clothes like other lotions. Tans you well, I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite for a great low price! Nice bronze tan, doesn't leave you looking orange.
customer_reviews.author: Ally B.

customer_reviews.title: Tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with some spilled out in the package other than that it's a pretty good product
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not a bronzing lotion
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this indoor tanning lotion because it rated in the top 5 recommended tanning lotions. I'm more into bronzers and this one doesn't bronze. I loved the smell and the ease of applying. I'm just looking for something to bronze me more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent - One thing I have learned about tanning indoor/outdoor products....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because my wedding is coming up and I need to even out my fading summer tan. Works decent... results are not as quick as expected but it does work. I have learned that any tanning product that is for BOTH indoor & outdoor - are not as effective in a tanning bed. I switched to a different product, might use this one in the summer outside.
customer_reviews.author: Panda007

customer_reviews.title: great lotion
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it feels on my skin,would buy again.....dries fast
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Deb Granger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tanning but a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this product when I am trying to tan outdoors. It does not streak and the smell is pretty inviting. Would purchase more often but it is a bit on the expensive side. That being said when I can indulge I do purchase this bad boy as a companion to my outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great & achieves a gorgeous tan
customer_reviews.text: I’m super picky when it comes to tanning lotions because of the scent. I’m one that gets headaches very quickly from scents so I was extremely pleased with this delicious scent! The color I was able to achieve very quickly while using it was super impressive. Definitely recommend as it’s a great value for the product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Found the same kind of product cheaper and it worked better
customer_reviews.author: alicia rickard

customer_reviews.title: Cheeky Brown
customer_reviews.text: Works ok..I read all these great reviews on how much tanner people got using cheeky brown. Works like any other indoor tanning lotion. Smell is good.
customer_reviews.author: maxwell513

customer_reviews.title: Good resulta
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this tanning lotion for a week now, and have a beautiful Caribbean glow. Not orange at all. And I love the smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good value for an indoor tanning lotion. It does smell sweet like bubble gum! Also, it arrived sealed and had no problem with bottle leaking like others had.
customer_reviews.author: ejrhins

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but great product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kind of tanning lotion to use however it can be kind of pricy
customer_reviews.author: heather king

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice although a little sticky feel after application however immediate results, nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Been using it about a month. Expected to be a little darker based on other reviews, but I'm getting there. May have to try something else and alternate. I love the way it feels though. Goes on smooth, not sticky and dries real fast. Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: best indoor tanning lotion in the market
customer_reviews.text: Do your research. This one is the best protection for indoor tanning beds
customer_reviews.author: Pam Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.text: As a first timer with the tanning bed, I wasn't really sure what to use. After a bit of searching and reading reviews I decided on this one. Works amazing leaving a great even tan and smells great when you put it on. Only down side is that after you tan, your whole body smells like a burnt coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice and brown. very good tanning lotion, reliable company, and a very nice price
customer_reviews.author: wendy lamb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this because I get tan fast, however a lot of it is from the bronzer and washes off.
customer_reviews.author: Eatsrainbows

customer_reviews.title: Nice tanning lotion and smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tanning lotion, smells delicious. I am very pale and after 7 sessions I have my base tan. No greasy.
customer_reviews.author: LBrown

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion when tanning the only one I use it does a perfect tan and doesn’t make u look like a fake tan I will always recommend cheeky brown to any level user
customer_reviews.author: Celenakay

customer_reviews.title: so much color!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LOTION! it got me so much color so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: This product smells good and leaves a nice bronze tan
customer_reviews.author: Sherry B

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!! Expired product!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! No stars. I just received my Australian Gold Cheeky Brown Accelerator today on 6/2019. It has an expiration date of 31/02018! WISH I had read all the bad reviews and all of the expired expiration dates on others who had purchased this product. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rogg

customer_reviews.title: Not my first choice
customer_reviews.text: Good smell but haven't really noticed much of a change since using. I typically use the Australian gold bronze stuff that's like 8 spf and get more results for it and its half the price of this one
customer_reviews.author: Emily ann Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I feel this product helps maintain a good color but doesn't truly help build additional color if you think you've plateaued. Great product to use if you don't tan regularly and want good and natural color fast.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Staudt

customer_reviews.title: Extremely watery
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before, but this 2 pack that I recieved from this specific seller was extremely watery...couldn't even apply the product as it was basically pure liquid. Threw this product in the garbage. Complete was of money...would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: results
customer_reviews.text: like how easy it goes on and isnt the orange look most tanning oils are, love the softness after tanning as well and my skin is showing the beautiful color have used australian gold many times but not this type, very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: sandra williams

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like this. First time i have used it..rubs in nicely, smell good..
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for a quick tan
customer_reviews.text: The tan is awesome and quick. I get compliments on the scent all the time. I feel like a walking advertisement having to tell everyone what the scent is. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing smells great idk how well it works tho... I’ve used it a couple of times I don’t think the bronzer is very strong
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This accelerator smells amazing and does a great job helping you get the most out of your tan.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen MacCabe

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning lotion as always. Not oily, and smells great !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, especially the smell. Also, I like the fact that 1. It's not too oily (I can get it off of my hands without soap and water) 2.its not bronzing so that I don't have uneven patches where I missed. Just a good old fashioned tanning lotion that always does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I enjoy the smell (some may not) and it does work! It doesn't streak either. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne S.

customer_reviews.title: One and Done
customer_reviews.text: Used this once in my tanning bed and I've been able to go a whole week without tanning! This really gives you a bronze tan and quick.... THIS should be what Jwoww's "One and Done" SHOULD be made of. Amazing product will buy when I run low!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works better than the really expensive lotion I bought at the salon. Smells good, doesn’t leave a sticky feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly VanOver

customer_reviews.title: The packaging fell apart
customer_reviews.text: The packaging fell apart once I got it. The plastic bottle stayed in tact and the product is great but maybe have better shipping conditions
customer_reviews.author: Megan93

customer_reviews.title: You wont burn , you will  tan ... Luv the scent ....
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for indoor tanning , love the scent and its easy to apply doesnt sgain your skin like some others do , keeps my skin moisturized and what a tan it gives you ..luv this product .....will buy again. ....
customer_reviews.author: Kikilynne

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Only one I buy! Price and smell and it works !
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Basic, yet effective tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Basic, yet effective tanning lotion. I don’t give into the hype of expensive tanning lotions so this is great for me. The bronzer isn’t too much and doesn’t stain my hands. The smell is pleasant and isn’t overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Patyk

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed bottle
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed and leary that I received my bottle without a seal under the lid. I would prefer a bottle that had a seal on the top pf the bottle UNDER the lid. How do I know this bottle is new?
customer_reviews.author: Sheila McEvoy

customer_reviews.title: Smells good. Not sure it helped me get tan
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. Reminds me of candy bubble gum. I felt like it took forget though to get tan. I'm honestly not sure how much this really made a difference. I've used almost the whole bottle and have ordered something different.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: good for making a nice base color
customer_reviews.text: This will not bring you brown color but it does help to get a darker tone. To have a clean base, I used this for 7 times before i use a bronzing tanning lotion and i got nice, seamless, neutral dark beige base.
customer_reviews.author: Anycia

customer_reviews.title: works good. goes on easy
customer_reviews.text: smells yummy. works good. goes on easy. gives a nice tint. I like this stuff. way better then those ones that cost 60+
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: Expired tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Bottle arrived expired 08/2019 just as previous reviews listed but smells fine & seems to be working. I would expect a new product not to be expired when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: misty copeland

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: The effects of this product used for home tanning bed are exactly what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Though the smell is nice.
customer_reviews.text: Came as described, but I have used other lotions and this one helped the least. I guess you get what you pay for. Though the smell is nice.
customer_reviews.author: TheHBIC

customer_reviews.title: Burned like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this set me on fire immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Durham

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Much cheaper than buying in a tanning salon.
customer_reviews.author: NC MOM

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was awesome. No orange color smelled really good and produces a nice even tone tan .
customer_reviews.author: melissa fuller

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - expired!
customer_reviews.text: Received a bottle with an expiration date of June 2018. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin S.

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUS TANNER*THIS IS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! NORMALLY I ONLY USE JWOW BRONZE AND TINGLE I AM A SERIOUS TANNER SO I ONLY WANT THE BEST, BUT THIS STUFF IT'S GREAT FOR HALF THE PRICE!! PACKAGE WAS ORDERED ON A FRIDAY WE'D AT MY HOUSE ON MONDAY AND IT TASKS NEW GREAT AND HAS AWESOME SMELL I RECOMMEND IT ANY DAY
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells very good, not greasing and really helped to accelerate my tan..
customer_reviews.author: wildchild

customer_reviews.title: Expired bottles are being sold!
customer_reviews.text: It did smell good but my bottle was expired by a year
customer_reviews.author: judy smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling tanning lotion, blends well into the skin and does not streek. Lotion arrived open however so some product was lost but overall satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: Revived a expired product. I recommend your local tanning salon
customer_reviews.author: R&R

customer_reviews.title: Best for base tans! Especially for paler beauties ;)
customer_reviews.text: Best for getting base tan, especially for more pale skin beauties ;) Can't give it 5 stars because the smell needs some work - I want to jump in the shower immediately after tanning because the smell is that unpleasant - but hey, that's the price you pay, right?!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cavender

customer_reviews.title: Date
customer_reviews.text: Was informed the date printed is not the expiration date but the manufacture date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go get some.
customer_reviews.text: This tanning lotion had me tan very fast. It allowed my skin to breath and also provided an even bronze tan.
customer_reviews.author: TFerg0694

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Was worth the money. Smells and feels good. Helps overall tan. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for getting a good tan
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy and absorbs into skin nice. Used for tanning bed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barnes Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tanning lotion! It's not too oily or runny on your skin with easy application. I have naturally tan skin so this was a good pick me up to catch up on a nice even Summer tan!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: This smells amazing. I cant wait for it to get sunny ...
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing. I cant wait for it to get sunny and hot enough, for me to give it a good go around. I have high hopes based on the reviews I have seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: megan spisak

customer_reviews.title: Goes on nice. Smells good. Fast tan!
customer_reviews.text: Lovveeeee this lotion! It's by far one of the best lotions I've used for a quick tan!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Dimarco

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't leave you streaky and it works well! To me it smells similar to bubblegum which is a little odd yet nice.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Williams

customer_reviews.title: Expired lotion
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package, it was already opened. Gave it the benefit of doubt and it made my skin spotty and ruined my tan.
customer_reviews.author: Tay

customer_reviews.title: so good!!
customer_reviews.text: yum!! the smell is like summer <3 its perfect for tanning because it just smells so good and it makes you relax.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I've spent way more $ on indoor tanning bronzers with not a good result. If you buy this lotion you will NEVER buy anything else. Awesome product! Buy it! By my third session I was noticeably darker and it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sroka

product_meta.title: Australian Gold, CHEEKY BROWN Accelerator Dark Natural Bronzers, Tanning Bed Lotion 8.5 oz
product_meta.description: Dark Tanning Accelerator Plus Bronzer. Get dark fast with Cheeky Brown advanced formula with natural bronzers. * The No. 1 dark tanning lotion Now with Bronzer! * Native Australian oils, Vitamins A and E create a skin-hydrating formula for a maximum tanning experience. * For Indoor and Outdoor Use Cheeky Brown Cheeky Brown is a Dark Tanning Accelerator Plus Bronzer The No. 1 dark tanning lotion-now has Bronzer! Get dark fast with Cheeky Brown advanced formula with natural bronzers. Native Australian oils, Vitamins A and E, create a skin-hydrating formula for a maximum tanning experience. Fragrance: Cocoadreams 8.5 oz
feature_bullets: The No. 1 dark tanning lotion Now with Bronzer!
Native Australian oils, Vitamins A and E create a skin-hydrating formula for a maximum tanning experience.
